html:
4.11.22  9:00 am   do you ever find yourself making changes to a composition after you've recorded most of it?

      rarely

4.11.22  7:47 am   What is not Steve from hi im Steve's name?

      it's probably your name

4.11.22  5:11 am   How to check if an dream of mine is actually attainable?

      go ahead and attain it

4.11.22  1:07 am   how would you describe the mood of the next song?

      spritely, awakening,

4.11.22  12:02 am   will the video after next be released a day after, on 4/20?

      absolutely not

4.10.22  11:45 pm   when was "long long long journey" written

      oct 19-21, 2018

4.10.22  10:25 pm   Does your upcoming song have a D7sus4 anywhere?

      no

4.10.22  6:48 pm   In your videos that include live action clips of you singing/playing instruments, do you record those parts first or do you animate the text/graphics first?

      nowadays it's almost exclusively footage first, then graphics

4.10.22  6:20 pm   how far are you into you're next song?

      all the way

4.10.22  6:18 pm   What's your favorite line in "And The Day Goes On"?

      it's 1900

4.10.22  5:39 pm   how do you feel about palm sunday;

     never heard of it

      would you move it to tuesday

      no

4.10.22  3:00 pm   have you ever entered a city and just been intensely overwhelmed by how cool and interesting everything is? 

      yes

4.10.22  12:37 pm   Is it theoretically possible to build a castle out of grains of salt?

      yes

4.10.22  12:34 pm   How do you make Music?

      no one knows

4.10.22  11:59 am   what does "i know that you might find a different way and i hope you scream it back at me" mean in more than a dream?

      it touches on the fact that there's always more ways, and also it's doing a reciprocation of the previous lines

4.10.22  11:53 am   ever had trouble seeming rude because of sticking to your values

      surely

4.10.22  11:53 am   are most of the questions you receive repetitive, even this one?

      most questions are not repetitive, but if you take any group of the questions then it's repetitive

4.10.22  10:46 am   How am I American but I don't like hotdogs or burgers?

      you might be a hipster

4.10.22  10:45 am   Are you interested in doing a very slow tempo song?

      i'm interested in every tempo

4.10.22  5:26 am   When is the next song written?

      the first line, musically, is from october 18, 2021, then a temporary lyric for that one line came 2 days later, which ended up being mostly the same as the actual lyric, and the remainder of the entire song was written 2 weeks ago

4.9.22  11:37 pm   What was your inspiration to make music

      everything. still is

4.9.22  11:05 pm   Was "more than a dream" not good at first?

     it didn't exist at first

     Is that why it took you a while to make it?

     i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

4.9.22  10:07 pm   do you hate listening to your voice when editing?

     sometimes, but that would be the whole reason for editing. take out those parts

     Does it sound different than what it sounds like in your head?

     no

4.9.22  6:34 pm   what is your favorite kind of tree?

      surprise me

4.9.22  5:29 pm   When you sing '432 i wonder' in your new song, is it intentional that the won sounds like 1, thus completing the countdown?

      the 1 reference is available there, if you fancy it

4.9.22  5:06 pm   How important is music theory for someone not interested in writing music, just in playing it?

      music theory is yours. you make the theory. and then, don't be alarmed when it breaks, ...... that's what it's made for

4.9.22  2:42 pm   are you thinking about making 60fps music videos?

     maybe

     If so, when?

     certainly during 2020

4.9.22  2:11 pm   how are your songs so damn good?

      i'm in a contest

4.9.22  1:48 pm   How come September and October are the 9th and 10th months, and not the 7th and 8th? My guess is there used to be less months?

     that's right

     But then why didn't we change the names accordingly?

     because names stick. i'm sure you've heard someone say they are going to 'tape' a video, or 'film' a video, while definitely doing it all digitally with absolutely no use of film or tape

     Please fix.

      ok i fixed it. enjoy

4.9.22  12:25 pm   How many layers of irony are there in your videos? 

      it's a gradient

4.9.22  8:30 am   How many words will be in the title of the next song?

      4

4.9.22  8:17 am   how do you come up with good music?

      impossible. it can't be done

4.9.22  7:50 am   does the 7 and 8 in "got some money" have any connection to "9 8 7"? or is it just a coincidence

      neither

4.9.22  7:29 am   Will you make a remake of any previous songs/videos you've made?

      there's many other things i have yet to make for the first time, so i should take care of those first, then maybe circle back for the re-makes

4.9.22  3:59 am   how to music theory?

      it's a paradox. if you get the hang of it, it no longer exists. turns out it's actually just 'music'

4.9.22  1:35 am   Good evening what are your thoughts on death?

      i think it's bullshit

4.8.22  10:35 pm   what is the best way to start a conversation with someone?

      start by showing a quick clip of the 'most interesting' part of the conversation, then go into like 3 minutes of extraneous titles and intro bullshit and then without further ado let's jump right into it. and don't worry about playing the most interesting part twice because it will still seem like it's the first time, especially if you get amnesia at some point along the way

4.8.22  10:27 pm   how do i revert my mind to a previous point in time where i didn't think as much

      try setting it to a future time where you don't think as much

4.8.22  9:40 pm   do you music

      it's on my to-do list

4.8.22  9:32 pm   do you get angry when people don't put question marks at the end of stuff?

      no

4.8.22  8:28 pm   What do you focus on most when making songs?

      the song, but that's actually a problem. that tends to stall it. the real trick is to focus on everything else besides the song. which is counter-intuitive because usually the song is what i really want

4.8.22  7:59 pm   what are your thoughts on the fact that you will release your next video on the anniversary of "got some money"?

      i haven't thought about it, but, if you have, then you'll probably get a kick out of the following release date after that

4.8.22  7:32 pm   Please, tell me how can I be a normal person. I am desperate. 

      have you thought about going to the corner store

4.8.22  5:58 pm   is I'm a Princess about having Stockholm Syndrome with your own creative process/drive?

      i've never thought about it that way, but you might be right

4.8.22  5:56 pm   would you include numbers below 0 in a future song?

      all options are on the table

4.8.22  5:26 pm   What Genre do you consider your songs to be?

      normal

4.8.22  5:24 pm   If 0.3 repeating is equal to 1/3, is 0.9 repeating equal to 1?

      approaches. that's true of both

4.8.22  4:50 pm   is music musical

      let me perform some calculations

4.8.22  4:24 pm   can u hold a violin bow the proper way 

      i think i could, but i'd have to research it first because i currently don't know, nor do i own a violin bow nor violin

4.8.22  3:17 pm   are the last chords of slow down, on the line 'client's name is always there', is it Bbma7 - Cadd4/A - Gadd4/E - F6add4/G? specifically, there's a B in the second-to-last chord and a Bb in the last chord - real quiet, but they're there, right? tell me i'm not going crazy

      yep, you got it right
